import {useState} from 'react'; import styles from './InvesmentForm.module.css'; const InvestmentForm = (props) => { const FormSubmitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); const [enteredSavings, setEnteredSavings] = useState(0), [enteredYearlyContribution, setEnteredYearlyContribution] = useState(0), [enteredExpectedReturn, setEnteredExpectedReturn] = useState(0), [enteredInvestmentDuration, setEnteredInvestmentDuration] = useState(0); props.calculateInvestment(e.target); } return

} export default InvestmentForm;
